label: uncl5379
comment: Code specifying the type of product group.

values.label: Base x coefficient
values.comment: The product is grouped based on price multiplied with a coefficient.

values.label: No price group used
values.comment: Code specifying that the product is not subject to price group.

values.label: Catalogue
values.comment: Code specifying that the product is indexed in a catalogue.

values.label: Group of products with same price
values.comment: Code specifying that all the products of the group have the same price.

values.label: Itemized
values.comment: Code specifying that the product group is itemized.

values.label: Current discount group
values.comment: Items in this discount group are available to the buyer at a common discount percentage.

values.label: Previous discount group
values.comment: The common discount percentage group to which an item previously belonged.

values.label: Price group
values.comment: Products grouped together on the basis of price.

values.label: Product group
values.comment: A code indicating a product group.

values.label: Promotional group
values.comment: Grouping of products for promotional reasons.

values.label: Legal
values.comment: A product group governed by a common set of legal rules.

values.label: Geographical target market division/subdivision code
values.comment: The target market is a geographical region based upon geographical boundaries sanctioned by the United Nations.

values.label: Manufacturer
values.comment: Products grouped together on the basis of manufacturer.

values.label: Supplier
values.comment: Products grouped together on the basis of supplier.

values.label: Worldwide-Semiconductors-Trade-Statistics number
values.comment: Prodcucts grouped together on the basis of Worldwide- Semiconductors-Trade-Statistics number.
